"Grant file access permission to All Videos to PDF Converter for opening and saving converted videos to PDF/Merge PDF/Image to PDF files in storage."

Step 1 :- Select video/Multiple Videos /Entire playlist 

 Step 2 :- Select Quality ,Low Quality will give 10 percent of the quality of videos you have selected, High Quality will give 100 percent of the quality of videos you have selected 

 Step 3 :- Ater process, it will saved into Saved PDF section in the appliction 

 Step 4 :- Open the Saved Section of the appliction given in the bottom bar and Open the uppermost PDF 

 You have successfully created your notes within in a minute

start

Certainly, the "All Videos to PDF Converter" app seems to be a convenient tool for converting video content into PDF notes. It can capture screenshots at specific intervals of time from video content, which can then be compiled into a PDF document. This can be quite useful for students or individuals who do not have the time to make notes during meetings, conferences,JEE/NEET/Any other competitive exam or while watching educational videos

The app able to create PDF notes from a complete course playlist or downloaded videos is particularly beneficial, as it no need to making-note process and helps students prepare for exams more efficiently.

Absolutely, the feature of capturing screenshots at selected intervals and compiling them into a PDF is a smart way to understand the step-by-step process. This not only provides a structured and organized set of notes but also allows for a sequential understanding of the entire process.

Step 1 :- Open the Saved PDF section in the given bottom bar of the application

 Step 2 :- Long pressed on the PDF, which you want to Rename 

 Step 3 :- Rename button will appear on the Top-right corner simply clicked it

 Step 4 :- Enter the name in the edit box

 Step 5 :- Click on Save button

Step 1 :- Open the Saved PDF section in the given bottom bar of the application

 Step 2 :- Long pressed on the PDF, which you want to Delete 

 Step 3 :- Delete button will appear on the Top-right corner simply clicked it

 Step 4 :- Dialogue box will appear to confirmation

 Step 5 :- Click on Yes button

Step 1 :- Simply click on the Merge PDF button given in the Edit section of bottoom bar 

 Step 2 :- Select PDF from the Storage in a sequence

 Step 3 :- Merge PDF saved into saved section in the application ater some process

Step 1 :- Simply click on the Image To PDF button given in the Edit section of bottoom bar 

 Step 2 :- Select Images from the Gallery in a sequence

 Step 3 :- Image to PDF saved into saved section in the application after some process

Thanks for offering! If You ever come across any issues or have any suggestions for improvement while using the app, I will make sure to reach out.contact us on given gmail, and I appreciate your proactive approach to addressing concerns.\n\n Click here for contact
